TreeLogicFunction.Name: Replace
TreeLogicFunction.Description: Replaces part of the specifed a text string with a different text string.

Argument.Name: OldText
Argument.Description: The text in which you want to replace some characters.

Argument.Name: OldValue
Argument.Description: The text that you want replaced.

Argument.Name: NewValue
Argument.Description: The text replacing the old text.
